title: A Cavern of Black Ice
description: The first installment in an epic trilogy returns to the Known Lands of The Baker's Boy, where Raif Sevrance, a member of the Clan Blackhail, and Ash March, a girl who is plagued by sinister dreams, are plunged into a realm of magic, war, and danger. 60,000 first printing.
author: J.V. Jones
